resources.string: Welcome to Weather App! Here you can select a city from the list and see the forecast
Select the quiz type and answer the quiz questions to test your knowledge about the world\'s countries.
First of all, please select the continent from which you want to test your knowledge. If you would like questions from all continents, then select "all continents".
You have passed this quiz! Keep up and complete all quizzes.
Select a country and find more details about it!
